CustomField.description: The field we wish to use to restrict the query. (i.e can be the contact lookup field if we only want to show a single constituent's information on the My Information portal page)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field we wish to use to restrict the query. (i.e can be the contact lookup field if we only want to show a single constituent's information on the My Information portal page)
CustomField.label: Controlling Parent Field API Name
